sections.title: The Alchemical Interpretation
sections.thesis: Psychological meaning of alchemical symbols and their relation to the union of opposites.

sections.body: This chapter matters because it clarifies the lens you will use throughout Aion: symbolic tensions are not distractions, but the material of psychological transformation.

terms.definition: A duplex mediator archetype in alchemy: ambivalent spirit-matter principle linking opposites.
A symbolic union of opposites, central to alchemical imagery and to psychological integration work.
The philosopher's stone as an image of realized transformation and stabilized union of opposites.
